idea-plugin.name: Quick File Preview
idea-plugin.description:
File Preview

This plugin enables a quick file preview/open/edit on simple selecting files in Project View - similar to the preview in Sublime or VSCode.

Features:
  • show preview (open temporary editor) of selected file
  • focus editor of selected file if already opened

This plugin is fresh like a mild breeze in summer - please contribute issues, ideas and feedback in GitHub.
